TADS 3 Library - scoring

This module defines objects related to keeping track of the player’s score, which indicates the player’s progress through the game.

Summary of Classes  

Achievement SimpleAchievement

Summary of Global Functions  

addToScore

Global Functions  

addToScore (points, desc)

score.t[288]

Add points to the total score. This is a convenience function that simply calls libScore.addToScore_(). TADS 3 Library Manual
